timeline.message:
Refactor to prevent endless loop.

Signed-off-by: Matthew Skinner <matt@pcmus.com>

Allow `-rtsp_transport tcp` to be over-ridden.

Signed-off-by: Matthew Skinner <matt@pcmus.com>

Display actual preset names


Signed-off-by: Matthew Skinner <matt@pcmus.com>

Allow IP to not match due to Hostname given in setup.


Signed-off-by: Matthew Skinner <matt@pcmus.com>

Fix index off by 1


Signed-off-by: Matthew Skinner <matt@pcmus.com>

Reduce null compiler warnings.

Signed-off-by: Matthew Skinner <matt@pcmus.com>

Clean up last of the null compiler warnings.

Signed-off-by: Matthew Skinner <matt@pcmus.com>

Change to a single line log output.


Signed-off-by: Matthew Skinner <matt@pcmus.com>

Remove dead code already handled earlier.


Signed-off-by: Matthew Skinner <matt@pcmus.com>
